summary: THE STEERING WHEEL SEEMS TO HAVE LOST ALL POWER STEERING CAPABILITIES, VERY SCARY!  MAKES IT EXTREMELY DANGEROUS WHEN ATTEMPTING TURNS!  NOTICED IT LUCKILY AS I WAS PULLING OUT OF A LARGE PARKING LOT.  TRYING TO REMEDY THE SITUATION SO I CAN USE A CAR THAT ISN'T AN ACCIDENT WAITING TO HAPPEN.
